system.description: Enchanting looks often conceal treacherous intent, and it is rightly so with this spell. A rosebush is enchanted with the blood of its victim, awakening its bloodthirst and malevolence. From then on, it is a level 3+2 monster (Killer Vine), waiting for someone to pick one of its flowers, or get close enough to its thorns to engulf and exsanguinate the victim.
